metadata.title: CVE-2023-46565 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in osrg gobgp commit419c50dfac578daa4d11256904d0dc182f1a9b22 allows a remote attacker to causea denial of service via the handlingError function in pkg/server/fsm.go.

criterions.comment: gobgp package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
